txt.en: Attention woodworkers,\n\nWe, the Eglain, require a number of fishing-rods to outfit our people with the ability to fish the few ponds throughout the Lone-lands. We will also use these rods to fish the great river in the east. If you are capable of crafting such items, we would be greatly appreciative. Please, deliver the fishing-rods to Léoflac at the Ost Guruth encampment.
'Yes, this fishing-rod is of good quality. We will see it distributed to our people, and given time, will send them to the ponds to fish for much-needed food. \n\n'Thank you for doing this.'
'Is there an undertaking that you are currently working on for the Eglain? Perhaps you should complete the order before returning to me....'

The Eglain are requesting that crafters proficient with woodworking deliver fishing-rods to them at their encampment in the ruins of Ost Guruth. The Eglain hope to be able to utilize the fishing-rods to provide for their people from the small number of ponds throughout the Lone-lands.
Collected a yew fishing-rod for the Eglain ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Deliver the yew fishing-rod to Léoflac

Craft and deliver the fishing-rod to Léoflac at the Ost Guruth encampment.\n\nThe Eglain have asked that fishing-rods be crafted and delivered to assist them in their efforts to survive in the harsh climate of the Lone-lands.
Collect a yew fishing-rod for the Eglain ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
